comment: By far the best professor I have ever had! He's easy to talk to, very willing to help and loves to teach. He explains physics so well. There are 2 exams + final.You get to have a cheat sheet. His grading is great. HW is 25% of your grade, labs 15%, exams 20% and final 25%. If you go to class/lab and do the HW, you will definitely pass.
Dr. palmer is a great teacher. I took this class before with a different prof and failed. I made a B in Dr. palmers class because he explains things much better than other teachers I have had before.

He is the best professor I have ever had in college. I'm not good at physics but after taking his class I was able to figure it out!!! He always is willing to help and cares if people are doing bad on tests....and he's really cute too!!!!
GREAT!EXCELLENT! He understands what his students have trouble with and focuses on it. He is very fair and approachable. I WILL DEFINITELY BE TAKING HIM AGAIN!!!
